title: Why do I lose full LP for games where bottom lane is 0-10-0 at 10 minutes?

replies.body: Because you did not realize the issue early and stop it. Next time pay more attention to the entire game that is happening.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9MWUgJ7V,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-11T09:00:56.084+0000)
>
> Because you did not realize the issue early and stop it. Next time pay more attention to the entire game that is happening.

10 minutes in u wanker
You can roam before 10 minutes. I do it all the time.

I lost because my bot lane (yes, both) were autofill.

What can I do about that?
Becuase riot product this company is shit
